  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.okta.sdk.error.Error, java.io.Serializable
    public class CredentialsException
extends AuthenticationException
    Update of user credentials failed. This exception was thrown as a result of a contains error information returned 4xx status, related error messages are contained within this exception.
    Since:
